The best part of the legendary WRC is on the way ! Immerse yourself in the world of virtual racing , and feel all the adrenaline and drive to test pilot sports car by participating in a contest . Welcome to the 2013 season , where you will be available to drivers, cars and tracks from the first three parts of the WRC for the first time - from the championship Junior WRC.
Enjoy improved graphics engine and unique realism that erases the line between what's happening on screen and real life. Also will please the players and such "trifles " as multiplayer for 16 players , changes of road surface and weather conditions, fascinating career mode , and much more .

Demonstrate high level and win a season racing FIA WORLD RALLY CHAMPIONSHIP 2013 official game !

WRC4 - it's best to date rally simulator , striking the imagination of players highly realistic , the variety of tracks and cars , hurricane multiplayer and many others. Take on 13 countries and win all the possible titles ! Features:
